title: Having issues Patching 7.12? Click Here!
body:
#***NOTE:  This thread will be unlocked once the new patch is live!***

Hey all,

We all need to pick a side:  Pirates vs Ninjas, Batman vs Superman, Genesis vs SNES, Star Trek vs Star Wars, and now -- Yasuo vs Riven

http://i.imgur.com/KrKt8i9.jpg

While new rivalries are born every day, there is one that we can definitely put an end to: You vs LoL Patcher.  If you want to land that knock out blow and make sure your patcher will bend to your will, check on the steps below!

------------------------------------------------

>#Why does the End of Game Stats screen take FOREVER to freakin' load?!

This might be due to the "Close Client During Game" option in the client.  This option makes the client close out when you enter a game, which means after the game it has to completely reboot to start.  Low Spec Mode should be enough to keep things running smoothly, so disable this option by entering the client, clicking the gear in the upper right hand corner, [and unchecking the box.](http://i.imgur.com/smwR8be.png)

>#I've  tried the Updated Client before, and it was sooooo laggy

We've made some massive changes to the Updated Client make it run as smoothly as possible, even on the proudest of potatoes.  Enable Low Spec Mode if it isn’t on already.  You can find out by clicking the gear in the upper right hand corner of the Updated Client and then [click "Enable Low Spec Mode"](http://i.imgur.com/rPGRnYW.png)

>#Patching Failed and we're not sure why Error: 004

This error usually occurs when Operating System Permissions isn't set properly.  Essentially, the patcher is trying to access files found on your hard drive, but it is being denied from doing so.  [Follow the steps in this guide to get this resolved!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

>#Something's up with our servers and it's preventing you from patching Error: 003

Occurs when the patcher isn't able to maintain a stable connection with our Patcher Servers.  If the patcher loses connection to the server to get the necessary files, it will simply stop working.  To get this resolved, [make sure to complete all of the solutions in this guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

--------------------------------------

If you have a problem that isn’t here or those solutions aren’t working, drop a comment below and we’ll be sure to respond and help you out!  ^.^

replies.body: after Patch, during gameplay, character health bar is black, most fonts are black, can't see status health and gold acquired??  also, the auto route was white now black as well??

> [{quoted}](name=LaserBrainiac,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EAYaa6AK,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-06-15T04:24:40.455+0000)
>
> after Patch, during gameplay, character health bar is black, most fonts are black, can't see status health and gold acquired??  also, the auto route was white now black as well??

also summoner spells are black as well, I have the same issue.

If this is still happening for you, then some game files may have gone bad.  A force repatch through the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) should fix this up.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EAYaa6AK,comment-id=000700000002,timestamp=2017-06-22T15:32:38.321+0000)
>
> If this is still happening for you, then some game files may have gone bad.  A force repatch through the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) should fix this up.

It stopped for a long while, but it started back up, I'll use the tool later on today. Thank you.
it was fixed for 2 days. now it's back again.  black fonts??!!  pls help.

> [{quoted}](name=LaserBrainiac,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EAYaa6AK,comment-id=000700000001,timestamp=2017-06-20T02:52:06.311+0000)
>
> it was fixed for 2 days. now it's back again.  black fonts??!!  pls help.

change the screen size each game in the video section of options and change it back, it's a temp fix until they find the bug

This might be caused by a bad game asset.  Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and perform a force repatch for a fix.  Let me know if that helps.  :D
**Character Inking** is not working on very low - low (character quality settings) :(

Oh no, I hope it's not leaking.  :x  There could be bad game or drivers causing this, though.  Try out the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to tune up your settings and files, and let me know if that does the trick for you!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EAYaa6AK,comment-id=000a0000,timestamp=2017-06-15T18:19:07.508+0000)
>
> Oh no, I hope it's not leaking.  :x  There could be bad game or drivers causing this, though.  Try out the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to tune up your settings and files, and let me know if that does the trick for you!

I still have the same problem, it got fix itself one day, but still without the character inking effect using the Quality Character on "low" or "very low"
Since I downloaded this patch, mine along with everyone else's Username, HP, and Mana HUD is all black and makes it hard to see. I've tried a full repair but nothings changed.

**PLZ HELP!!! **after every game my client is inaccessible it minimizes.
https://clips.twitch.tv/PluckySmokySoybeanNotLikeThis
Look at upper left corner That is what happens i can hear chat but i obviously cant click within there.
I've been having this same issue. I have to CTRL+ALT+DELETE to get out of the client because it crashes just so I can log in again
Do you have [close client during game](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) enabled?  Disable that option if so, and let me know if that restores your client after a match.
Having close client during game enabled is what fixed the issue for me, ironically enough.
find your league folder go to lol launcher and unpin your old client from taskbar

This could be caused by having [close client during game](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) enabled, and failing to properly load after the match.   To help rule out some possibilities, disable that option and let me know if it works for you.
I already checked that. It seems to be because of the old pinned client on windows. I fixed mine by finding lol launcher and using that as my new pinned lol launcher.

Help me with this issue on my client i update my game and lunched the game and now i need to update 1 more time in client i even can open my account but for start a match i shall wait to get the fully update but the thing is my download speed goes down after 800MB left of update and after that the 800MB goes back to 988.8MB and my download speed goes down from 500Kbps to -70Kbps then the number that i need to Download (i mean 988.8MB) goes down to 988.6 then goes back to 9.88.8 again can some one help me this is the first time it happening for me

My screen turns black and cant see anything but can hear the sounds. A fix this for me was to run borderless; it fixed the problem but going full screen and tapping out causes the game to go black screen on you. This never happened to me before; but it just started idk what changed. It was either the patch that was just released or the windows update.

If you're alt+tabbing while the game is loading it can cause some stutters since the loading gets interrupted. I'd suggest staying on that loading screen until it's finished.

I'd still like to try addressing that black screen, which is most likely happening from a weird graphics card interaction. Let's make sure to update your [**drivers**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) and let me know if that helps!
my graphic card is up to date; even reintalled the game and the card
Every game after I load to 100%, I get disconnected.
I have FPS drop from 2 days.

Check out the steps in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) while making sure to update any graphics drivers too. If that doesn't help, hit me back up with a little more detail on what's happening and we can troubleshoot more!
My pulsefire caitlyn skin disappeared after update!!

That's pretty weird that a gift would just disappear like that. I think I see what happened on the back end of your account, but I wouldn't want to give out any personal information here on the boards. Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can go over what happened there!

It has come to my attention that there are several summoners with similar usernames and behaviours. The problem with these are that they intentionally feed, and when someone attempts to forfeit, they don't say "yes" or "no". Because they're all so similar, it seems as though they are bots. This really needs to be brought to your attention because they're very bothersome and make for an unhappy round. They first showed up in Twisted Treeline, but i just recently found some in Summoner's Rift; this is very worrisome to me because it leads me to think that they're growing in numbers. I'm not sure if there's anything you can do about this issue, but it does need to be brought to your attention, as they are a major problem.
You're absolutely correct! We definitely want to do something if you're encountering a lot of bots, and the best way to make sure it happens is to report them in the post-game screen.

hi 
i'm a new player after downloading the game an installing it and opening the launcher i can't see the "play" button 
also the launcher isn't downloading the patch although it's stuck at 0 % and the amount of data should be downloaded is just increasing to enormous number see the pictures 
https://image.ibb.co/k9K2Ck/here_2.png
https://image.ibb.co/kzCYJQ/here.png
thanks
EDIT:it seems that the game writes it's gonna download 14 gb but it goes halfway and works after that the data will somehow be compressed to 7 gb that is what i got from further research and we will see .

It looks like your patcher is currently scanning the game files to see what it needs to update. This is always the first step our patcher takes when updating, and you'll need to wait for it to completely scan the files before it will begin to actually update. If you notice that it gets hung up on certain files or never gets passed 30%, try updating your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) to make sure the patcher has access to all of it's files.

same i left the game for almost a year and when i download it i cloudnot press the play button it shows me that you must download    14000 mg    and im looking for someone answer me and i didnot find anyone

Mac user here. Since patch 7.9 so now for 3 patch, my FPS are super low 30 - 40 average.

I have a high config and could easy play the game in high with 100+ fps.

Now I can't play the game with more than 35 - 45 fps in low. I had a talk with the support for more than 1 month now and tried various fix for not much change. They told me "It is a known issue and we have no date yet for a fix".

Can I get a confirmation it is worked on ? Because to me 3 patchs without a fix for a major issue making the game use 100% cpu and lowering fps by more than half should take priority.

I'm not aware of any current widespread issues for mac users, but frame drops could be caused by general wear and tear.  My recommendation here would be to try out the steps in our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide.  If the issues persists, reach back out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team can continue assisting individually!

There is an issue with mac from at least 7.8, this patch killed it even more - from 80 constant to 35 constant and 10 teamfights. Nothing else changed - just game.

Check this post : with many widespread comments from community : https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/BifuO2pE-patch-712-fps-drop
when I double click league client it doesn't  open what can I do to fix that?

Try updating your [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) just in case your OS isn't recognizing League as a safe program. Let me know if that helps!
it didn't helped me :(

Yes my client is stuck on reconnect, I was dced about 2 hours ago now and it wouldnt let me reconnect so i got on my other account and i could connect fine. i get back on this account and its stuck on reconnect but i cant reconnect to a game so its just stuck on there please help.

I am getting horrible frames when I play all of a sudden which makes no sense to me. I updated all my drivers, I reinstalled the game, I restarted and turned off my pc for a while but I'm still running the game bad as in low frames and a slight delay in everything I do. I'm thinking its the patch but I just experienced this problem last night and nothing before that during the patch. Has anyone experienced this before?

I'm having issues with my pings and it could be based on my preference for left--click for attack move, or so I think.

I hold down G or V for pings and neither respond appropriately. Instead I get a grey icon showing me it is pressed, but moving it in the direction requested it shows merely the grey icon itself and nothing more. Is there anything I can do to resolve this?

It kind of sounds like the config files for pings might be a little off. I'd like you to try resetting those really quickly to see if that fixes your pings. Go through these steps, test out your pings in a practice match and let me know how it goes!

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EAYaa6AK,comment-id=00170000,timestamp=2017-06-18T20:15:15.866+0000)
>
> It kind of sounds like the config files for pings might be a little off. I'd like you to try resetting those really quickly to see if that fixes your pings. Go through these steps, test out your pings in a practice match and let me know how it goes!
> 
> - Log into the game client
> - Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
> - Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
> - Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
> - Leave game to sync settings

Still not working. However, I hadn't realized the other ping options until this occurrence hahaha.. Perhaps I'll try some that don't require me to click to confirm? :) Almost like quick-cast, yeah? Either way, I suppose this will do for now. Thank you for your efforts.

After the patch the "Play" button became gray and you couldn't click it, giving the error "We aren't able to create a lobby right now. Please exit the client and re-open it to try again". I've tried the Hextech Repair tool and even uninstalling to see if there was an error within the files.

most of the time a gray play button can be a sign that your network is having a hard time getting a solid connection with our servers. Let's check up on some of your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) really quick and let me know if updating those helps out.

My client downloaded the patch without a problem but when it to scan files, it stopped at 4 files scanned or "releasemanifest". I cannot get over this issue, I even tried to initiate full repair but it only closes the client. Help pls.
*update* My client says it is offline and will not do anything despite being connected to the internet.

This is an issue we're investigating currently, where some players are getting an offline error when trying to reconnect while in-game.  The following workaround should help fix this up:

Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Open "LeagueClientSettings.yaml" with notepad
Find the line:

gameflow-patcher-lock:

Delete this whole line
Save the file, restart your LoL Client - and you should be able to log in again.
Having the same issue but this fix isn't working, a full repair either.

> [{quoted}](name=Aurrock,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=EAYaa6AK,comment-id=0010000000000001,timestamp=2017-06-18T06:14:11.461+0000)
>
> Having the same issue but this fix isn't working, a full repair either.

Just to verify on my end, is this about the pings?
